29#include "../common/common.h"

31/*
32 * ex_set -- :set
33 * Ex set option.
34 *
35 * PUBLIC: int ex_set __P((SCR *, EXCMD *));
36 */
37int
38ex_set(SCR *sp, EXCMD *cmdp)
39{
40 switch(cmdp->argc) {
41 case 0:
42 opts_dump(sp, CHANGED_DISPLAY);
43 break;
44 default:
45 if (opts_set(sp, cmdp->argv, cmdp->cmd->usage))
46 return (1);
47 break;
48 }
49 return (0);
50}
